programme.title: 2025 4 Nations Face-Off

programme.title: 2025 4 Nations Face-Off
programme.desc: The United States squares off with Sweden in the last 4 Nations Face-Off round-robin match. The U.S. clinched its berth in the final by defeating Finland and Canada by a combined 9-2 score, while Sweden was defeated by both 4-3 in overtime.

programme.title: 2025 4 Nations Face-Off
programme.sub-title: Championship: Team Canada vs. Team USA
programme.desc: Canada and the U.S. meet in the inaugural 4 Nations Face-Off championship game. Jake Guentzel scored twice as the U.S. clinched a spot in the final with a 3-1 win over Canada on Feb. 15. Canada held off Finland 5-3 on Feb. 17 to secure the rematch.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Mr. Howell loses $3 million to Gilligan in a putting contest.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Though surrounded by water, the castaways suddenly discover that there isn't a spare drop to drink.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.sub-title: Plant You Now, Dig You Later
programme.desc: Gilligan unearths a chest, which the castaways think contains a pirate's treasure.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: A mob leader and his henchmen fleeing from the police land on the island.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: In a test of a deadly new missile, the Air Force zeros in on the castaways' island.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan meets a jungle boy and the castaways try to teach him English.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Angry because the men haven't kept their promise to build them private houses, the women move away.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.sub-title: Big Man on a Little Stick
programme.desc: The castaways have an unexpected visitor: a surfer from Hawaii who came in on a tsunami.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Are an Ape's Best Friend
programme.desc: A gorilla is enchanted by Mrs. Howell's perfume and kidnaps her.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan is embarrassed when has to be rescued while he tries to save a drowning Mary Ann, so the other castaways devise ways to try to make him feel like a hero; he gets the chance to be a real hero when a headhunter arrives on the island.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Wrongway Feldman returns to sample the island life and he decides to live on the island forever.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Mrs. Howell engineers a romance between Gilligan and Mary Ann.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The castaways form a band, but Gilligan's drumming is mistaken by local natives as a sign of war.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The castaways overhear the voices of gangsters threatening their lives.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Mr. Howell wins all of the Skipper's possessions betting on turtle races.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The Skipper insists a stone found by Gilligan will grant the finder three wishes before sundown.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan puts skipper on a crash diet after they plan on joining the Navy when they are rescued.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The castaways find a crate of magician's props. They each decide to learn one of the tricks and put on a show.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: A famous painter, who has renounced civilization, visits the island.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Mr. Howell puts Gilligan through basic training to be a millionaire's socialite son.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.sub-title: A Nose by Any Other Name
programme.desc: A fall from a coconut tree gives Gilligan an inflated nose and a deflated ego.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan finds himself a blushing bride when a native chief comes to the island to marry off his daughter. However, he must compete with another suitor for the young woman's hand.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan suggests a beauty contest to decide who the prettiest woman is on the island. Others try to influence him to cast his vote in their favor.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The exiled president of a revolution-torn country visits the island.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: A rocket bound for Mars lands on the island.The castaways hope to use it to get off the island.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: Gilligan has the winning ticket for a South American sweepstakes.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The Professor concludes the island is sinking from bamboo poles he set in the lagoon.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The castaways make a silent movie in the hopes that it will be discovered by someone who will rescue them.
